snippet: KLASS--Rochelle, 74. Born in New York City in 1941, Rochelle received a BA from Marymount Manhattan College in 1985. She retired as supervisor of the hospital's hematology laboratory following a career as an employee of Lenox Hill Hospital. A lifelong resident and lover of NYC, its people, food and culture, she contributed regularly to City Harvest to help feed New Yorkers in need. Beloved sister of Sheila Powlison (Earl) and Philip Klass (Patricia), and aunt of Shoshana Kvasnica, Tamar Burdekin, Micha Powlison, Aaron Klass and Benjamin Klass. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KLASS--Rochelle, 74. Born in New York City in 1941, Rochelle received a BA from Marymount Manhattan College in 1985. She retired as supervisor of the hospital's hematology laboratory following a career as an employee of Lenox Hill Hospital. A lifelong resident and lover of NYC, its people, food and culture, she contributed regularly to City Harvest to help feed New Yorkers in need.
